sentence: We’re told Rams players Tyler Higbee, Brian Allen, Troy Reeder, Coleman Shelton, Greg Gaines, Michael Hoecht, Jamil Demby, JJ Koski, Ben Skowronek, Jeremiah Kolone, Brycen Hopkins, Christian Rozeboom and John Mundt sat down for dinner at 9:30 p.m. and “ordered everything” on the menu, including multiple surf & turfs, endless margaritas and more.
author: Francesca Bacardi
title: LA Rams celebrate Super Bowl win with Las Vegas bash

sentence: With Whitworth gone after 16 years in the league, Havenstein (seven years) is the dean of the line, followed by Noteboom and center Brian Allen (four).
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Rams could have a lot on the line in NFL draft
